actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide the authorization for fiscal year 1974 and succeeding fiscal year for the Committee for Purchase of Products and Services of the Blind and Other Severely Handicapped.

summary.text: Increases the authorization, for fiscal year 1974 and succeeding fiscal years, for the Committee for Purchase of Products and Services of the Blind and Other Severely Handicapped. Defines "direct labor" for purposes of the Wagner O'Day Act relating to the handicapped as work required for the preparation, processing, and packing of a commodity or work directly related to the performance of a service, but not supervision administration, inspection, or shipping.

titles.title: A bill to provide the authorization for fiscal year 1974 and succeeding fiscal year for the Committee for Purchase of Products and Services of the Blind and Other Severely Handicapped.
